entry.name: Line of Sight
entry.description: This sample is an implementation of a simple line-of-sight algorithm: Given a height map and a ray originating at some observation point, it computes all the points along the ray that are visible from the observation point. The implementation is based on the Thrust library (http://code.google.com/p/thrust/).
entry.keywords: Line of sight,algorithm,height map,parallel scan primitive,data parallel algorithms,Computer Vision
entry.supported-env: linux:x86_64, linux:i686, windows7, macosx:x86_64, macosx:i686, :arm, linux:ppc64le
